main event: A civilian in Salem, Ohio reported seeing a bright, hovering object in the sky on January 20, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a large star and hovered quietly before abruptly taking off at a very high speed.
Several other people in the area, including the person's children, had also reported seeing similar objects in the past.
The document requests the civilian to complete an FTD Form 164 to provide more details about the sighting.
Another report describes an object hovering over a wheat field in the summer, which was silent and appeared to be metallic.
One report mentions seeing slim, glowing humanoid figures hovering 30-40 feet off the ground, which the witness felt afraid of.
sighted object: a bright, hovering object; metallic craft; humanoid figures
